00039 GenotypeReportFilterEngine * GenotypeReportFilterEngine::FromBase(BaseEngine *engine)
00040 {
00041         if (engine != NULL && engine->getEngineName() == GenotypeReportFilterEngine::EngineName())
00042                 return (GenotypeReportFilterEngine *)engine;
00043         return NULL;
00044 }

00046 GenotypeReportFilterEngine::GenotypeReportFilterEngine() {
00047     defineOptions();
00048 }
00049 
00050 GenotypeReportFilterEngine::~GenotypeReportFilterEngine() {
00051 }

00053 void GenotypeReportFilterEngine::defineOptions() {
00054         defineOption("s", "sample-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00055                 "Text file specifying full paths to sample files.",
00056                 "");
00057         defineOption("r", "report-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00058                 "Text file specifying the report metrics.",
00059                 "");
00060         defineOption("o", "out-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00061                 "Output text file containing the files that pass the thresholds.",
00062                 "");
00063         defineOption("", "file-col", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00064                 "The sample file column header.",
00065                 "list_files");
00066         defineOption("", "sample-status-col", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00067                 "The sample status column header.",
00068                 "Sample Status");
00069         defineOption("", "sample-col", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00070                 "The sample column header.",
00071                 "Sample");
00072 }

00074 void GenotypeReportFilterEngine::defineStates() { }

00076 /**
00077  * Make sure that our options are sane. Call Err::errAbort if not.
00078  */
00079 void GenotypeReportFilterEngine::checkOptionsImp()
00080 {
00081     defineStates();
00082         string str;
00083         str = getOpt("sample-file");
00084         if (str.empty() == true)
00085                 Err::errAbort("Must specify the input sample file.");
00086 
00087         str = getOpt("report-file");
00088         if (str.empty() == true)
00089                 Err::errAbort("Must specify the input report file.");
00090 
00091         str = getOpt("out-file");
00092         if (str.empty() == true)
00093                 Err::errAbort("Must specify an output file.");
00094 }
00095 
00096 void GenotypeReportFilterEngine::writeHeader(std::ofstream &out)
00097 {
00098         std::vector<std::string> option_names;
00099         getOptionNames(option_names);
00100         std::vector<PgOpt::PgOptType> option_types;
00101         getOptionTypes(option_types);
00102         for (int i = 0; i < option_names.size(); i++) 
00103         {
00104                 switch (option_types[i]) 
00105                 {
00106                 case PgOpt::BOOL_OPT:
00107                         out << "#%" << option_names[i] << "=" << getOptBool(option_names[i]) << endl;
00108                         break;
00109                 case PgOpt::DOUBLE_OPT:
00110                         out << "#%" << option_names[i] << "=" << getOptDouble(option_names[i]) << endl;
00111                         break;
00112                 case PgOpt::INT_OPT:
00113                         out << "#%" << option_names[i] << "=" << getOptInt(option_names[i]) << endl;
00114                         break;
00115                 case PgOpt::STRING_OPT:
00116                         if (getOpt(option_names[i]).empty() == false)
00117                                 out << "#%" << option_names[i] << "=" << getOpt(option_names[i]) << endl;
00118                 }
00119         }
00120 }
00121 
00122 static string GetFileTitle(const string &file)
00123 {
00124         string name;
00125         string::size_type start = file.rfind("\\");
00126         if (start == string::npos)
00127                 start = file.rfind("/");
00128         if (start == string::npos)
00129                 start = 0;
00130         else
00131                 ++start;
00132         string::size_type end = file.rfind(".");
00133         if (end == string::npos)
00134                 end = file.length();
00135         name = file.substr(start, end-start);
00136     return name;
00137 }
00138 
00139 /**
00140    This is the "main()" equivalent of the engine.
00141 */
00142 void GenotypeReportFilterEngine::runImp()
00143 {
00144         // Open the input sample file and create a map of
00145         // file name to full path.
00146         affx::TsvFile tsv;
00147         string file = getOpt("sample-file");
00148 #ifdef WIN32
00149         tsv.m_optEscapeOk = false;
00150 #endif
00151         if(tsv.open(file) != TSV_OK)
00152                 Err::errAbort("Couldn't open the file: " + file);
00153         tsv.rewind();
00154         string sampleFile;
00155         map<string, string> sampleMap;
00156         tsv.bind(0, getOpt("file-col"), &sampleFile, TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00157         while(tsv.nextLevel(0) == TSV_OK)
00158         {
00159                 sampleMap[GetFileTitle(sampleFile)] = sampleFile;
00160         }
00161         tsv.clear();
00162 
00163         // Open the input report file. Each row represents a sample with
00164         // call rate. These will be compared against the threshold.
00165         file = getOpt("report-file");
00166         if(tsv.open(file) != TSV_OK)
00167                 Err::errAbort("Couldn't open the file: " + file);
00168         tsv.rewind();
00169         string sampleStatus;
00170         string sampleName;
00171         tsv.bind(0, getOpt("sample-col"), &sampleName, TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00172         tsv.bind(0, getOpt("sample-status-col"), &sampleStatus, TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00173 
00174         // Create the output file
00175         file = getOpt("out-file");
00176         ofstream out(file.c_str(), ios::out);
00177         writeHeader(out);
00178         out << getOpt("file-col") << endl;
00179 
00180         // Determine those files that pass the thresholds and output them
00181         // to the output file.
00182         while(tsv.nextLevel(0) == TSV_OK)
00183         {
00184                 if (sampleMap.find(sampleName) == sampleMap.end())
00185                         Err::errAbort(sampleName + " was not found in the sample file.");
00186                 if (sampleStatus == "Pass")
00187                         out << sampleMap[sampleName] << endl;
00188         }
00189 
00190         // Close the files.
00191         out.close();
00192         tsv.close();
00193 }
